short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extract job description from job sites such as LinkedIn, Indeed, etc. to save applications with one click. Companion for Skip Round

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Using this extension you can extract a job description from sites such as LinkedIn, Indeed, Lever, Ashby etc. and create an application in Skip Round. 

Note: This is a companion extension for Skip Round. You need to have a Skip Round account to use this extension.
